Good Comments: Best group to use after Chyuu... They carried this series afterwards. Only use FBI if you like trollsubs.

Don't listen to the guy who said he knows japanese and that these subs are worse than FBIs. ISS's translation is very direct and I didn't notice any notable mistakes. Had I known how good these subs are I would've watched this show a lot earlier.
Inaccurate as fuck... FedSubs more reliable since Chyuu is dead
Bad Comments: These subs are bad. They're more inaccurate than the current FedSubs. As a person who knows JP, ISS tends to fuck up a lot mroe than FedSubs. Chyuu > Fed > ISS in terms of accuracy.
Best alternative to Chyuu if you can't wait
